h1: Calories in a Quart of Chinese Seafood Soup
assumptions: Restaurant-style with shrimp, fish, vegetables, mushrooms in light broth; no added noodles or thickeners; approx. 946 ml per quart.

quick_answer.text: A quart of Chinese seafood soup offers about 426 kcal and 38 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Creamy version with coconut milk per 100 ml

faqs.q: How many calories in a quart of chinese seafood soup?
faqs.a: Approximately 426 kcal for a standard light broth version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in chinese seafood soup per quart?
faqs.a: About 38 g protein from seafood and veggies.

faqs.q: Is chinese seafood soup high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 4730 mg per quart due to broth and seasonings.

faqs.q: How do carbs in chinese seafood soup compare?
faqs.a: Roughly 28 g carbs per quart, mostly from vegetables.

faqs.q: Does adding rice noodles change calories in chinese seafood soup?
faqs.a: Yes, adding noodles can increase calories by 600+ per quart.
